duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-level administrative support to the founder, including managing calendars, scheduling meetings, and coordinating travel arrangements.
Assist in planning and executing strategic initiatives, projects, and events under the founder's guidance.
Serve as a communication bridge between the founder and internal teams, external partners, and stakeholders.
Gain exposure to all aspects of the business, understanding its operations, systems, and processes.
Participate in ongoing learning and development to grow into the Chief of Staff role.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related field (Master's preferred)
